dmca.title: Alleged Theft of Feathery Posts [Blogger]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 

I am writing, at your instruction, to file a notice of infringement in compliance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). 

I would like to state for the record my belief that, in a case like mine, a cursory examination on your part would have revealed that much of my blog (151 posts as of the date the theft was discovered: May 8, 2007) had been stolen and there was content on the offending blog other than my own 151 posts. The theft was blatant and obvious and should have been quickly handled within Blogger
